评论详情: It needed a good steaming to get a lot of the wrinkles out and I still never could completely remove the weird fold/lump on one of the boobs, but it was otherwise perfect for an outdoor summer wedding on a hot day. Loved the shape, the tie on the back, the sleeves, and the color. Wore a strapless bra and still could have used a little extra space in the boob area but that’s not uncommon for me 🤪
Fits to size

My daughter bought this to wear under her graduation gown. It was a little longer than she wanted being 5’3” so we did have a friend hem it. True to size. We had it dry-cleaned initially to get wrinkles out and because I wanted it perfect without stress. Lightweight for a summer day but wasn’t see-through.  Flattering around the waist. Sleeves can be worn up or as an off-the-shoulder. Had such a nice flow to it!  She received lots of compliments! We tried getting this in the romper style, but it looked too much like shorts. Great outfit and worth the price!

Had to return because the fit was strange. I have a chest, but the bust in this dress was so big I couldn't wear it. Everywhere else the fit was fine and the material was okay. Don't buy unless you have giant boobs, then you'll probably love it.
The quality was good, it was comfortable, it felt light weighted, really pretty and worth the money, it did have the stretchiness on the top part which was good.

I am 5’10”, and this is the first mini dress i’ve bought that hasn’t been too short. It’s definitely very close to being too short, but i got away with it. this is also suitable for curvier girls that have large busts and smaller rib cages. The tie allows you to size up for the bust size and then cinch to suit your rib cage. The zipper is good, and the material has a slight stretch to it to allow for breathing room. As far as value for money goes, I would say this dress is priced too high. This feels more like a $20 dress than $40. The fabric skirt is EXTREMELY see through, so the quality isn’t there at all. I feel like for $40 the quality should’ve been better.

评论概述: Not for the tall or small chested!!
评论详情: I had a hard time choosing between 3 and 4 stars. The fabric is pretty thin but I could've gotten past that. The color is gorgeous.  My gripes: - The dress fits better off the shoulder. If I put the sleeves up, it makes the chest looser. - Even with the sleeves off the shoulder, there's still so much loose fabric in the chest that I can't wear it. And if I try wear a bra, the straps will show. A strapless bra might work? I'm about a 36B / Medium in bras. - It is SO short in the front. It's got a faux wrap style and where the sides cross, it comes up so high. I'm about 5' 10" and it BARELY covers my bits. Granted I have a bit of a thicker middle and bum but still.  Overall it wasn't terrible quality, but just not for my body type.
